title: The Vevellis Chronicles: The Crescent And The Cross
description: Brothers, Antonis and Nicola Vevellis, become bitter rivals in love and ideology as both fall for Katerina, the daughter of a powerful politician. Under tutelage of General Alexis Sartis, their father’s protégé, they are exposed to the wider world in the capital, Constantinople, the jewel of Christendom. Against the backdrop of the ancient powers entwined in war, the three will determine the future of two worlds and create the history, as we know it.
author: Zack Varkaris
